items.title: Tesla sues California DMV over false-advertising ruling
items.summary: Material regulatory/legal development for TSLA as it challenges California DMV's ruling related to Autopilot/FSD marketing claims.

items.title: IBM drops ~13% on Anthropic COBOL-tooling disruption narrative
items.summary: IBM suffered an unusually large single-session decline as investors repriced legacy modernization exposure after Anthropic's COBOL automation update.

items.title: Update: tariff shock broadens into deeper risk-off move
items.summary: Follow-through selling indicates tariff-policy shock is now an active de-risking event. Most exposed watchlist names: NVDA, AVGO, TSLA, AAPL, MSFT, GOOG, TSM.

items.title: Macro trade-policy shock (U.S. tariffs legal whipsaw)
items.summary: Policy whipsaw around U.S. tariffs increased uncertainty and triggered a risk-off tone.
